thread.title: Fan Homage to a Favored VW Has One Glaring Flaw: Speed

author: Spencer Jakab
title: Fan Homage to a Favored VW Has One Glaring Flaw: Speed
text:
Herbie the VW Beetle vanquished Ferraris and Corvettes he raced in the 1968 film “The Love Bug.”
So it’s Gabriel Nathan’s lot in life to face drag-racing challenges from the likes of the Mercedes AMG that pulled alongside him at a red light a few months ago, engine revving.
Mr. Nathan drives a near-perfect Herbie replica, a customized 1963...
